messages.title: My priorities
messages.content: This is a unique election. I want to use my experience to fight for our local communities and to help stop the SNP and the Tories who have divided our country. Above all, I want an outward-looking, liberal, optimistic future in partnership with the world – not the intolerant and divisive SNP obsession with independence or the Tory hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Robert Brown wants to prevent another independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose the Conservatives' destructive hard Brexit.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Robert Brown aims to counter the Conservatives' approach to Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Scottish education and mental health.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Robert Brown advocates for investments in Scottish education and mental health services.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose the Conservatives' destructive hard Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: Above all, I want an outward-looking, liberal, optimistic future in partnership with the world – not the intolerant and divisive SNP obsession with independence or the Tory hard Brexit.

images.caption: The best choice to be your MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote for a local champion Not a cheerleader for independence.
